titleStmt.title: A discovery of divers sorts of asses: with the description of their condition, setting them forth in proper colours, according to Smithfields fancies and inventions Also, follies petition against all sorts of fooles and asses, desiring to have them banisht to the Ile of Sillie.

A discovery of divers sorts of asses: with the description of their condition, setting them forth in proper colours, according to Smithfields fancies and inventions Also, follies petition against all sorts of fooles and asses, desiring to have them banisht to the Ile of Sillie.

publicationStmt.publisher: July 8. London printed for Iohn Powel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
